title: Sabry-led delegation to depart tomorrow for talks with IMF
body_lines: The Sri Lankan delegation led by Finance Minister Ali Sabry will depart the island in the early hours on Sunday (April 17) to take part in the discussions with the International Monetary Fund.
The talks are taking place in Washington, United States from 19-24 April.
The finance minister is accompanied by Central Bank Governor Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe and Secretary to the Finance Ministry Mahinda Siriwardene.
